children.value: 37. Write a C program to sum of upper triangular matrix.

Enter 9 co-efficients of the matrix-
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
The given matrix is
 1 2 3
 4 5 6
 7 8 9

Sum of Upper Triangle Elements : 11
37. Write a C++ program to sum of upper triangular matrix.

Enter 9 co-efficients of the matrix-
1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
The given matrix is
 1 2 3
 4 5 6
 7 8 9

Sum of Upper Triangle Elements : 11
37. Write a Java program to find sum of upper triangular matrix.

Enter 9 co-efficients of the matrix-
1 2 3 4 5 4 3 2 1
The given matrix is
 1 2 3
 4 5 4
 3 2 1
Sum of the 0 row is = 6
Sum of the 1 row is = 13
Sum of the 2 row is = 6
Sum of the 0 column is = 8
Sum of the 1 column is = 9
Sum of the 2 column is = 8
